title: Bug 10593: Jar export should add ".jar" suffix if not specified
description: When exporting files using the jar export feature, the generated jar file does not automatically include the ".jar" suffix if it is not specified in the name.
OB: Upon exporting files with the jar export feature and providing a name without the ".jar" suffix, the resulting jar file is created without the expected suffix.
EB: The jar export functionality should automatically append the ".jar" suffix to the generated jar file if not explicitly provided in the name.
SR:
1. Open Build 20020228.
2. Select some files for export.
3. Choose the jar export option.
4. Enter a name without the ".jar" suffix, for example, enter "test" as the jar name.
5. Observe that the generated jar file is created with the name "test" instead of "test.jar" as expected.
